scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'.next','static');const dest=path.resolve(process.cwd(),'..','..','..','_next','static');console.log('POSTBUILD dest:',dest);const cp=(s,d)=>{if(fs.statSync(s).isDirectory()){fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>cp(path.join(s,f),path.join(d,f)))}else{fs.copyFileSync(s,d)}};try{fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});cp(src,dest);console.log('Static files copied OK')}catch(e){console.log('Static copy FAILED:',e.message)}"
